participant_1.background:
I love my family and friends, who are always supportive of my creative endeavors.
I had a knee injury when I was younger, but it's healed well and doesn't bother me anymore.
my skin is olive colored.
I spent the week traveling and writing about my experiences.
i have two tattoos.

participant_2.background:
I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
i live in alabama.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i wear a red purse.

content.text: I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm good, thanks! Where are you from?
Oh nice, what are some of your favorite things about Alabama?
I love the music scene here! There are so many great musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, which gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
That's great to hear! I love music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love indie rock and hip-hop.
Me too! I love how indie rock is so creative and unique.
Yes, it's so much fun to discover new bands and genres.
I agree! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The 1975, The Neighbourhood, and The XX.
I've heard of The 1975 and The Neighbourhood, but I'll have to check out The XX.
